title: Capstone
content:
What requirements do the professors look for when choosing a team for capstone project?
Do they choose based on project topic and/or team?

comments.body:
They look at the team members and the domain you have chosen. You will be given a list of all professors and what domain projects they oversee along with their email IDs. You have to form a team, decide a domain and then contact professors via email asking them to be a guide.

Ask them fast because each professor can only have around 4 teams under them and the popular professors get asked really fast and you may not be able to get the professor you want.

You decide the topic only after the team and guide are finalized. You have ample time till first review to decide the topic while discussing with your guide.
That is what the first review is about: your topic. The panel will see your review, look at the novelty of the topic and then approve it. Only rarely, the topic will get rejected(in case of duplicates)
